QuestData.Title: Sweete's Orders
QuestData.Description:
<Tucked into the pages of the captain's logbook is a letter bearing the seal of Harlon Sweete.
It looks like these pirates have been ordered by Sweete to cause further disruption to House Waycrest.
Lucille should be notified of this immediately!>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Sweete's Orders to Lucille Waycrest in Drustvar.
QuestData.RewardText: <Lucille reads the orders.>$B$BSo This pirate seeks to destabilize House Waycrest? As if we don't have enough problems already!$B$BThank you for bringing this to my attention, $c. It seems that the coven might just be the beginning of Kul Tiras' troubles...
